meanings.definition: Situated in or towards the east.
meanings.sent1: The sun rises in the eastern sky every morning.
meanings.sent2: She lives in the eastern part of the city.
meanings.sent3: The eastern wind carried the scent of fresh flowers.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts always drifted towards the eastern horizon.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the eastern sunrise painted the sky in hues of pink and orange.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characteristic of the East.
meanings.sent1: Her dress was adorned with intricate eastern patterns.
meanings.sent2: The eastern culture values harmony and respect.
meanings.sent3: The eastern traditions added a touch of mystique to the ceremony.
meanings.sent4: His room was decorated with various eastern artifacts.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of eastern spices filled the kitchen, creating a warm atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: An eastern breeze brought relief from the summer heat.
meanings.sent2: The eastern ships arrived at the harbor with exotic goods.
meanings.sent3: The eastern travelers shared tales of their adventures.
meanings.sent4: The eastern migration of birds signaled the change of season.
meanings.sent5: The eastern sun cast long shadows as it set behind the mountains.
